sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SYMPLOCE, συμπλoxη, in Rhetoric, a figure, where the same word is repeated several times in the beginning and end of a sentence, including the Anaphora and Epirtophe. Thus, “ Quis legem tulit ? Rullus. Quis majorem populi partem suffragiis privavit? Rullus. Quis comitiis præfuit ? Idem Rullus.”
